body: A nauseated spellcaster can use some of the energy of a conjuration (healing) spell to try to counteract the nauseated condition. When a nauseated spellcaster casts a conjuration (healing) spell, she can choose to take a 20% chance of spell failure with that spell. If the caster successfully casts the spell, the spell also ends the nauseated condition.
name: Nauseated
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellblights/Description of Spellblights/Optional Benefits of Harmful Conditions/Nauseated
